biocontainers.name: nanocomp
biocontainers.summary: Comparing runs of oxford nanopore sequencing data and alignments

biotools.summary: Compare multiple runs of long read sequencing data and alignments. Creates violin plots or box plots of length, quality and percent identity and creates dynamic, overlaying read length histograms and a cumulative yield plot.

bioschemas.name: nanocomp
bioschemas.summary: Compare multiple runs of long read sequencing data and alignments. Creates violin plots or box plots of length, quality and percent identity and creates dynamic, overlaying read length histograms and a cumulative yield plot.

galaxy.summary: Compare multiple runs of long read sequencing data and alignments
